mapper.select: SELECT /* OracleStock.selectStockStoreList */ Z1.STR_CD storeCode ,Z1.BIZPLC_NM storeName ,'(' || Z1.STR_CD || ')' || Z1.BIZPLC_NM exposeStoreName ,Z1.RD_NM_SIGUNGU_ADDR address ,Z1.RD_NM_DTL_ADDR1 addressDetail ,Z1.BIZPLC_PHONE_NO phoneNumber ,ROUND(Z1.DISTANCE * 1000,-1)||'M' distance ,Z2.USFL_STK_QTY remainStock ,Z1.LAT lat ,Z1.LNG lng FROM (SELECT T1.STR_CD ,T3.BIZPLC_NM ,RD_NM_SIGUNGU_ADDR ,RD_NM_DTL_ADDR1 ,BIZPLC_PHONE_NO ,( 6371 * ACOS( COS( T2.LAT / 57.29577951 ) * COS( T1.LAT / 57.29577951 ) * COS( T1.LNG / 57.29577951 - T2.LNG / 57.29577951 ) + SIN( T2.LAT / 57.29577951 ) * SIN( T1.LAT / 57.29577951 ) ) ) AS DISTANCE ,T1.LAT ,T1.LNG FROM TB_SA_BIZPLC_ADD_L T1 ,( SELECT * FROM TB_SA_BIZPLC_ADD_L WHERE STR_CD = 'DB67') T2 ,TB_SA_BIZPLC_M T3 /* 사업장 마스터 */ WHERE T1.STR_CD = T3.BIZPLC_CD AND NVL(T3.CLSTR_YMD,'29991231') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') /* 폐점일자 */ AND NVL(T3.SAL_CLS_YMD,'29991231') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') /* 영업일자 */) Z1, TB_ST_STR_SKU_ARSLT_L Z2 /* 매장 실재고 */ WHERE DISTANCE < 2 AND Z1.STR_CD = Z2.STR_CD AND Z2.RNP_YMD = '20190502' AND Z2.GDS_CD = #{goodsCode} AND Z1.STR_CD <> 'DB67' ORDER BY Z1.DISTANCE ASC
SELECT /* OracleStock.selectStoreLocation */ LAT lat ,LNG lng FROM TB_SA_BIZPLC_ADD_L WHERE STR_CD = #{storeCode} /* StoreCode Parameter */
